channel.title: CVE Feed for HDF5 Group -- libhdf5
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HDF5 Group -- libhdf5

item.title: CVE-2022-25972|2024-09-17T03:48:38.559Z -- hdf5%20group -- libhdf5
item.description: An out-of-bounds write vulnerability exists in the gif2h5 functionality of HDF5 Group libhdf5 1.10.4. A specially-crafted GIF file can lead to code execution. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.
